subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Kyle Busch added a win Saturday in the Nascar Craftsman Truck Series race at Auto Club Speedway in Fontana, Calif., to his runner-up finish in the truck race last week at Daytona. Busch was dominant in the 100-lap truck race in Fontana, leading for 51 laps.
